entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Barrhead
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:26 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -24.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Barrhead 09:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -24.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 72 %
Dewpoint: -28.1°C
Wind: NE 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
